sentences.en: a love quiz in a magazine
Below are printed the answers to the Brain of Soccer 1993 quiz.
sentences.cn: 以下所印的是1993年“脑力足球”小测验的答案。

sentences.en: He asked us to prepare for a quiz.
How did you do in the maths test [ quiz ] ?
sentences.cn: 你的数学 考 得 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: Match your skill against the experts in this quiz.
sentences.cn: 在这一测验中你与专家较量一下技巧吧.

sentences.en: The quiz showed up Cane's weak points in physics.
sentences.cn: 这次测验看出了凯恩在物理学方面的弱点.

sentences.en: The quiz was a good opportunity for the exhibition of his knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这次测验是他显示知识的好机会.

sentences.en: The teacher gave us a quiz in English.
The teacher went over the quiz and discussed the student's mistakes.
sentences.cn: 老师审阅了试卷,讨论了学生的错误.

sentences.en: We'll have a quiz at the end of the show.
sentences.cn: 节目的最后我们要举行一次智力竞赛。

sentences.en: We've also got a bonus quiz with crates of beer as prizes!
sentences.cn: 我们还获得了一次参加有奖智力竞赛的机会，奖品是成箱的啤酒！

words.tran_cn: 广播电视测验节目主持人

phrases.tran_cn: 机智问答；智力竞争节目

trans.tran_en: a competition or game in which people have to answer questions
to ask someone a lot of questions
